pullRequest.title: Code quality/increase coverage of default device response

commit.message:
Merge pull request #2 from OSGP/development

Updating Fork
no longer using assertEquals but now using assert that recursive

nodes.bodyText: indentation is not ok, check your IDE settings
Remove this line; the default strictness is better.
do not use tabs, check your IDE settings
A single-line comment should be preceded by a blank line, see https://www.oracle.com/java/technologies/javase/codeconventions-comments.html#341
new CorrelationIds("orginazationTestId", "deviceIdTest", "correlationUid") is used in more tests, refactor it into a constant CORRELATION_IDS
the difference with the previous test should be clear from the method name

commit.message: removed final junit, changed indent , added whtie space above single line comments
made cor ids const and removed unclear 2 at the end of test method name

nodes.bodyText: Constants should be all uppercase with words separated by underscores, see https://www.oracle.com/java/technologies/javase/codeconventions-namingconventions.html

commit.message: changes constant variable names and ran eclipse auto-format

changes styling with auto format from eclipse

I tought this was  already applied in my previous push, however this was not case.
